title: 220 Perkins, Super Clean and Spacious, Walk to BART, Lake
posting_body: ['Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.', 'If you have any concerns about the  legitimacy of our ads please contact us immediately at',
